DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Developing symptom checklist late-effect lymphedema may help doctor learn lymphedema patient head neck cancer plan best treatment . PURPOSE : This phase I/II trial develop checklist lymphedema symptom patient head neck cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Developing Checklist Lymphedema Symptoms Patients With Head Neck Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - To develop validate symptom checklist late-effect lymphedema patient head neck cancer . ( Phase I ) - To examine late-effect lymphedema symptom patient use preliminary patient-symptom checklist develop phase I . ( Phase II ) - To examine psychometric property patient symptom checklist . ( Phase II ) OUTLINE : - Phase I : Experts review initial symptom checklist late-effect lymphedema symptom provide suggestion concern revision . The checklist revise use card sort method . Patients sort card label symptom group feel appropriate base upon symptom experience . Sorting perform accord frequency severity symptom . Patients may write symptom list card . Patients undergo collection demographic lymphedema-related symptom information . Additional medical information obtain patient ' medical record . - Phase II : A final symptom checklist late-effect lymphedema symptom construct base preliminary checklist develop phase I . The psychometric property preliminary checklist also assess . Patients undergo collection demographic , lymphedema-related symptom , medical information phase I .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Meets 1 follow criterion : Patients meet follow criterion : Diagnosis local squamous cell carcinoma head neck Developed lymphedema cancer treatment No current evidence cancer recurrence No metastatic disease Identified oncology practice VanderbiltIngram Cancer Center Volunteer expert meeting follow criterion : Member Pain Symptom Management Team VanderbiltIngram Cancer Center OR faculty member/clinician associate Principal Investigator 's prior clinical research Vanderbilt Medical Center Knowledgeable symptom head neck cancer patient experience PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : No history psychotic illness PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : See Disease Characteristics More 3 month since prior cancer treatment No concurrent chemotherapy radiotherapy No concurrent antipsychotic medication
